content:
Dear [Subscriber],

In our last email, we shared with you Gary Dranow's struggles with manic depression and how it has fueled his creativity and inspired his music. Today, we wanted to follow up on that and tell you more about one of his most personal songs, "Made it Another Day."

The song speaks directly to the experience of waking up every day with the weight of the world on your shoulders, only to find the strength to keep going and face your daily struggles once again. The lyric "Like a rat in a wheel" brings to life the never-ending struggle to get your personal life in order, only to be dissuaded at the end of every day. It's a powerful and relatable message that is at the heart of Dranow's music.

Despite the challenges he's faced, Dranow is thrilled to be performing and sharing his music with fans once again. His unwavering spirit and determination are an inspiration to all who have followed his journey. Keep your ears open for more Gary Dranow and the Manic Emotions in 2023 and beyond.

Thank you for being part of our community and supporting us on this musical journey. We're excited to see what the future holds, and we're honored to have you along for the ride.

Rock on!

Best regards,

Gary Dranow and the Manic Emotions
